questions.question: you / Would / like / television / to / watch / ?
questions.answer: Would you like to watch television?

questions.question: have / you like / Would / to / soda / a / ?
questions.answer: Would you like to have a soda?

questions.answer: Would you like to play a game?

questions.answer: Have you ever written a text message?

questions.answer: Have you ever traveled by ship?

questions.answer: Have you ever swum with dolphins?

questions.question: haven't / changed into / yet / We / our shorts
questions.answer: We haven't changed into our shorts yet.

questions.question: sunblock / hasn't / He / yet / put on
questions.answer: He hasn't put on sunblock yet.
